summary: Comprehensive testing completed for FlowTask Pro authentication system, theme management, and time-based task features. All authentication flows, theme persistence, live clock, and user-specific task management working correctly on both desktop and mobile.
passed_tests: User registration with email/password authentication
User login with existing credentials
Session-based authentication with cookies
Protected routes correctly redirecting to login when unauthenticated
User logout functionality
Current user info retrieval (/auth/me endpoint)
Light/Dark theme toggle on authentication page
Light/Dark theme toggle on dashboard
Theme persistence in localStorage across sessions
Live clock display on dashboard with real-time updates
Quick add task functionality with time field
Task creation in Task Manager with date and time
Task display showing time with clock icon (3:30 PM format)
Daily Flow visualization showing tasks with time
User-specific task filtering (tasks belong to authenticated user only)
Task CRUD operations with authentication
Task statistics endpoint with user filtering
AI Assistant chat functionality with user context
Navigation between Dashboard, Task Manager, and AI Assistant
Mobile responsive design and navigation
Mobile theme toggle functionality
Mobile authentication flows
Mobile task creation and management
Cross-device theme synchronization
